title: Turf Club Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Turf Club Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
gin
3/4
ounce
dry vermouth
1/4
ounce
maraschino liqueur
1
dash
absinthe
1
dash
orange bitters
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well for around 20 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a small piece of lemon peel over the drink and drop the twist in as garnish.
Gin
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
